meanings.sent1: My friend is a vegetists and only eats vegetables.
meanings.sent2: Many vegetists choose not to eat meat for ethical reasons.
meanings.sent3: Why did the vegetists bring a salad to the barbecue?
meanings.sent4: In a world of carnivores, the vegetists stood out like a colorful garden.
meanings.sent5: The vegetists at the party always brought the most delicious veggie dishes.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of vegetists.
meanings.sent1: The vegetists restaurant offered a wide variety of plant-based dishes.
meanings.sent2: Her vegetists lifestyle inspired others to eat more greens.
meanings.sent3: The vegetists picnic was full of vibrant salads and fresh fruits.
meanings.sent4: The vegetists community was known for their dedication to sustainable living.
meanings.sent5: The vegetists market was bustling with shoppers looking for organic produce.

meanings.definition: The belief or practice of abstaining from the consumption of meat.
meanings.sent1: Vegetists often have to carefully read food labels to avoid hidden meat ingredients.
meanings.sent2: The vegetists movement is gaining popularity worldwide.
meanings.sent3: At the vegetists potluck, everyone brought creative meat-free dishes.
meanings.sent4: Her commitment to vegetists was unwavering, even in the face of tempting burgers.
meanings.sent5: The vegetists lifestyle promotes a healthier planet for future generations.
